full_text: Screened by NARA, 8/11/2023 EFFECTIVE DATE means: the date, as shown on our records, on which your coverage begins under this contract or under an Definitions amendment to it. (continued) FAMILY CONTRACT means: a contract which covers: the subscriber: his or her spouse: and their dependent children until they reach age 19 or marry, whichever occurs first. "Children" means: your or your spouse's children by birth: adoption (including any probationary period): and children who are under your or your spouse's legal guardianship. The offspring of a dependent child is included as a family member as long as the dependent child remains eligible. A family contract may also include: (1) children who are mentally or physically incapable of earning a living and who, upon reaching age 19. have received approval from Blue Cross to continue coverage under the family contract; and (2) a former spouse of a divorced subscriber until either remarries WHEN the subscriber is legally obligated to provide health insurance INDIVIDUAL CONTRACT means: a contract which covers only the subscriber. INPATIENT means: a registered bed patient. MEMBER means: each person who has the right to benefits under this contract. MENTAL DISORDERS mean: psychiatric illness or disease. These include drug addiction and alcoholism. The illnesses or diseases that qualify as mental disorders are listed as such in two books: the latest editions, at the time you receive treatment. of: the World Health Organization's "International Classification of Diseases"; and the American Psychiatric Association's "Diagnostic and Statistical Manual - Mental Disorders". OUTPATIENT means: a patient who is not a registered bed patient. PARTICIPATING COORDINATED HOME HEALTH AGENCY means: an agency which has an agreement with Blue Cross to provide the services described in your contract. PARTICIPATING GENERAL HOSPITAL means: a general, maternity or acute contagious disease hospital which has an agreement with Blue Cross to provide the services described in your contract. PARTICIPATING PHYSICIAN means: a physician who has an agreement with Blue Shield to provide the services described in your contract. PARTICIPATING PSYCHOL.OGIST means: a psychologist who has an agreement with Blue Shield to provide the services described in your contract. PARTICIPATING SKILLED NURSING FACILITY means: a facility which qualifies as a skilled nursing facility under Social Security regulations and has an agreement with Blue Cross, other than as a cooperating skilled nursing facility. to provide the services described in your contract. PARTICIPATING VISITING NURSE ASSOCIATION means: a visiting nurse association which has an agreement with Blue Cross to provide the services described in your contract. Page 5 REASONABLE CHARGE means: the charge which we determine to be within the range of fees most often made by similar providers for the SERVICE or supply
